about_the_game:
Welcome to " Rise of a Legend, " Where strategy, skill, and blood sport collide. Stripping away the confines of traditional RPG storytelling, we deliver you directly into the heart of raw, unadulterated combat. This is not a journey through narrative landscapes but a test of mettle.

Game Overview:

As a new Ludus owner in ROAL, you're thrusted into a brutal world where only the strong survive. Forget the tales of heroes and quests; here, your glory is carved from blood and sweat of pure combat. Our game combines intense third-person action fighting with deep management mechanics, offering a singular focus on the visceral thrill of gladiatorial combat.

Key Features:

  • Single and Multiplayer Progression: Victory in the arena is your path to fame. Each fight is a chance to prove your worth, with the blood of your foes. Take on the single player match modes and level up your gladiators or chance multiplayer, where the winner is given choice of mercy or take their opponents life PERMANENTLY. 

  • Pure Combat System: Engage in high-octane, third person action where every move and counter are a dance with death. Our combat is designed to be raw, thrilling and merciless, ensuring that only the most skilled gladiators rise to the top.

                              

  • Strategic Ludus Management:

Your prowess in the arena is matched by the challenge of managing your Ludus. Select and train your gladiators, manage resources, and heal injuries to prepare your fighters for the relentless battles that await.

                              

  • Gladiator Customization: Craft the ultimate warrior tailored to your strategic preferences. Equip your gladiators with a lethal arsenal and armor sets that enhance their killing prowess, preparing them for the variety of combat styles they'll face.

                              

  • Dynamic Weather: Randomized weather to enhance the experience inside the arena. 

                              

  • Unique Fight Styles and Experience: Each fight style is different and will take practice. Winning in matches and leveling up is the way to unlock their full potential. 

Why Rise of a Legend?

ROAL cuts to the core of what makes gaming exhilarating: pure, unbridled combat. With an uncompromising focus on blood sport, it challenges you to master the art of fighting and management, pushing you to the limits of your strategic and combat skills. In " ROAL " every battle is a story of its own, written in blood of the vanquished. Prepare to enter the arena, where legends are born from combat, not tales.

content_descriptors.notes: ROAL is a Roman Gladiatorial combat and management game with realistic violence and historically accurate representations and themes.  Blood, gore, decapitation, defenestration, and more are possible during combat.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 version 1703 (Creators Update)
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX-2000 series or newer, or AMD RX-6000 series or newer, or Intel® Arc™ A-Series Graphics Cards or newer
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Rise of a Legend is a third-person action RPG that immerses you in the ruthless era of gladiatorial combat. Engage in rich single-player progression or take on challengers in online multiplayer matches. Manage your Ludus, level up your fighters, and boost your house's prestige with every victory.
